subject: M7: Update justfile with Zig commands
description:
Add Zig build and test commands to justfile.

**Commands to add:**
```makefile
zig-build:
    cd zig && zig build

zig-test: zig-build
    test/test-zig.sh

zig-release:
    cd zig && zig build -Doptimize=ReleaseFast

test-all: test zig-test
```

**Acceptance criteria:**
- `just zig-build` compiles Zig binary
- `just zig-test` runs tests against Zig
- `just zig-release` builds optimized binary
- `just test-all` runs both Node and Zig tests
